notes: Interrupts the user's channeling spells upon cast.
First increases maximum health, keeping the current health value. The current health percentage is not kept.
Then increases the current health by the same amount. This does not count as a heal and bypasses any heal manipulation.
Upon losing the buff, reduces maximum health, keeping the current health value. The current health percentage is not kept. This means the current health bonus is not reverted.
This means the current health bonus is not reverted.
Multiple instances of the buff do not stack. A re-cast increases the current health again, and refreshes the existing buff.
abilities.description: Increases your current and maximum health by 400 for 15 seconds.

name: Essence Ring
description: An ancient bauble blessed by the breath of Verodicia.
